decision_conditions: The proposed single storey rear extension and  part ground floor/part first floor side extension  by virtue of their scale, mass, design  and roof form would create a bulky and incongruous addition to the host property  that would be visually intrusive and detract from the character and  appearance of the host property and surrounding area. The proposal would not accord with Policy D3 of the London Plan (2021), and CS8 and DM10 of the Core Strategy (2012) and the Residential Design SPD (2013)

Due  to the submission of inconsistent and contradictory plans Officers are unable to fully assess the impact of the proposed development on the character and appearance of the host dwelling or the immediate surrounding area.The applicant has therefore failed to demonstrate, through the submission of cogent information, that the proposed development would not have an unacceptable adverse impact in terms of character and appearance, in conflict with Policy D3 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies CS8  and DM10 of the Core Strategy .

Due  to the submission of inconsistent and contradictory plans Officers are unable to fully assess the impact of the proposed development on the neighbouring amenities  of the host dwelling or the immediate surrounding area. The applicant has therefore failed to demonstrate, through the submission of cogent information, that the proposed development would not have an unacceptable adverse impact in terms of character and appearance, in conflict with Policy D3 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies CS8  and DM10 of the Core Strategy .
description: Erection of single storey rear extension, part ground floor/part first floor side extension and rear dormer roof extension with installation of 2nos. front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion.
